name: Rope Token
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: ROPE brings the well known "market volatility index" to the crypto market and DeFispace. It can be utilized to hedge against market movement, trade volatility, a measuring tool, and all the benefits of having a volatility index. Staking will be available through Raydium.
